divs: Sighting DetailsAt aproximatly 122 my wife and I saw a white orb (about the size of a pin), 2 degrees off of a newly created chemtrail. The orb remained in veiw for about two minutes before disappearing. The chemtrail was created at about FL 38-42, there was no clouds at the time. The orb was seen about 10 sec after the aircraft started the chemtrail. We were looking east as the aircraft was moving west to east. The area above where I live in Colorado Springs has been a state of heavy contrails in the last months. I have also seen other UFO's during the night time in the area. Salmat jarin!
trends: There have been 106 other sightings in Colorado Springs
There were no other sightings in Colorado Springs on or around November 23rd 2010
Summary: White orb near recently created chemtrail
